name: BeHatted
description:
A wired game design project exploring a combination of Tetris, Bejeweled and Hats...

Mobile friendly.

PC Control: Left/right arrow keys to move, down arrow or shift to drop, up arrow to rotate

Mobile Control: Swipe left/right to move, Swipe down to drop, Tap to rotate

Also available at https://hujyyyy.github.io/BeHatted/

Enjoy!
